step.cmd: In your source document, find the topic for which you want to create a Related Topics list.
Create a list of cross-references for the topics you want to display in the Related Topics list at the bottom of the topic.
Apply the RelatedTopic paragraph style to the list of cross-references by inserting the proper output class.

stepxmp.p:
For example, the following list of cross-references has a RelatedTopic paragraph style applied to it through a DITA outputclass:
Context-Sensitive Help Topics
Expand/Collapse Sections

result.p: In generated output, a related topics section displays at the bottom of this topic. If you are reading this in the output, you can see the related topics section at the bottom. Go ahead and click the links, they work.
